title: Incept eSports Recruiting | LF Diamond 1+ Mid Laner and Top

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hey League Community
Incept eSports are on a lookout for an serious Mid land and Top laner, to join our squad to enter into the OCE competitive scene. Players must be serious, motivated and mechanically skilled in their role, in order to achieve the end goal of OPL. Currently we are only taking applications for Mid and Top. Lower ranked diamonds are also considered.

What do we offer you?
We at Incept eSports offer you a friendly, supportive staff to help you strife for glory and to help you make a name for yourself in the competitive scene. along with the supportive staff you will get the chance to play along a team of mechanically skilled players.

What do we require from you?
-You will need a Large champion pool, to adapt to the changing metas (or willing to learn new champs)
-Basic Voice Communications (TS mainly)
-Speak English
-Diamond 1+ as of this season (Lower diamonds considered)
-A flexible Play time
-Stable Internet Connections
-Serious and motivated

If interested Contact Process in Game for Trial and interview.

https://www.facebook.com/IncepteSports/
https://twitter.com/inceptesports

Cheers,
